ca.nengo.util

Interface VisiblyMutable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsynNeuralModule, DecodableEnsemble, Ensemble, ExpandableNode, GolgiTendonOrgan, LinkSegmentModel, MultiTerminationNeuralModule, MuscleSpindle, NEFEnsemble, NEFNode, Network, NeuralModule, NeuralModule, Neuron, Node, PlasticEnsemble, Simulator, SkeletalMuscle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsAsynNeuralModule, AbsNeuralModule, AbstractEnsemble, AbstractNode, CriticallyDampedMuscle, DecodableEnsembleImpl, DefaultAsynNeuralModule, DefaultNeuralModule, EnsembleImpl, ExpandableSpikingNeuron, FunctionInput, GruberNeuronFactory.GruberNeuron, HillMuscle, LinkSegmentModelImpl, LocalSimulator, MultipleInputNeuralModule, NEFEnsembleImpl, NetworkArrayImpl, NetworkImpl, NeuralModuleTest, PassthroughNode, PlasticEnsembleImpl, PyramidalNetwork, SkeletalMuscleImpl, SpikingNeuron

    public interface VisiblyMutable
    An object that fires an event when its properties change in such a way that it expects the user interface to display it differently. This allows the user interface to update when the object is changed through another means, such as scripting.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  VisiblyMutable.Event
      Encapsulates a change to a VisiblyMutable object.
      static interface  VisiblyMutable.Listener
      A listener for changes to a VisiblyMutable object.
      static interface  VisiblyMutable.NameChangeEvent
      Encapsulates a change in the name of a VisiblyMutable object.
      static interface  VisiblyMutable.NodeRemovedEvent
      Encapsulates a "node removed" change in the VisiblyMutable object.
